thread.section_title: TireCrazy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TireCrazy.com | tirecrazy.com
thread.title: Rodney Lee

author: Rodney Lee
title: Rodney Lee
text: There was only two choices in the size of tires I neede. I felt the price was fair but the shipping experience was where my disappointment came in. I put a note on my door requesting any shipping needing a signature be delivered at my neighbor house because I work during the day and he is home all day. The FedEx driver didn't, my neighbor was waiting all day for a knock at the door, that never happened. I had to wait another day for the tires!!
